app.title: AnagramR
app.author: Fabrice Montfort
app.description:
Tired that grandpa wins to scrabble?

Want to check the existence of a word?

Want to find a 9 letters word using a joker (or 2 if you rate this app from the settings screen)?

You now have the opportunity to see the accented spelling in French and to check the definition of each word in the proposed list of your search results on Wiktionary site.

Thank you for sharing your ideas and feedback to improve this app and make it fit better to your expectations.

app.title: ArenaCore - ICT Infrastructure Change Management
app.author: ArenaCore Pty Ltd
app.description: ArenaCore supports ICT Change Management Planning, Product Catalog Management, Asset Location Management and Monitoring / Config / Helpdesk System Integration. The ArenaCore Infrastructure Manager is an easy to use, visually oriented tool that supports modelling of the complete composition of equipment items regardless of the number of levels of sub-component hierarchy. Forward and rearward views of equipment items are supported, and Plan view of any internally situated components.

app.title: Ardisia Labs - Ardisia Component Library
app.author: Ardisia Labs
app.description: The Ardisia Component Library includes over 65 components to make it even easier to build powerful, robust, and fast applications in Flash and Flex.

app.title: bCommunities - Secure B2B Collaboration
app.author: Dan Samper
app.description: A disruptively efficient online platform that enables businesses to powerfully and securely interconnect their operations with their clients and suppliers in minutes. Features silo-bursting project management, communications, CRM and microblogging while fostering best practices and accountability.

app.title: Blueriver business application framework
app.author: Novusnet
app.dev: Apache Flex 4.13.0, Adobe Flashplayer and AIR, Adobe Coldfusion
app.description: Blueriver is a business application framework to support middle and large scale applications. Up to now, two independent applications ware build with this tool. Novusnet Film : An online management tool for TV spots and film productions, tailor made for the Production Industry. Novusnet Print : A printing management tool to design, edit, and print commercial, retail and promotional messages.

app.title: BusinessQ: Business Intelligence and data visualization software
app.author: Qualia LTD
app.description:
BusinessQ provides the insight you need to make better business decisions. Let BusinessQ tell you the story of your business data in precise, effective and unambiguous way – from monitoring your Sales, overseeing your inventory, measuring business success, or tracking Key Performance Indicators.
It helps companies to see otherwise hidden patterns, to spot business problems on time as well as to identify useful opportunities in their raw data.

app.title: CityU Mobile
app.author: Office of the Chief Information Officer, City University of Hong Kong
app.description: An official app of City University of Hong Kong providing a convenient platform for staff, students and visitors to access important information about CityU.

app.title: Dallmeier PromoApp
app.author: Dallmeier
app.description: You can use the Dallmeier PromoApp to learn all you need to know about video surveillance and video security technology. The latest product data, videos and brochures are waiting for you here. This is also where we introduce you to our free tools. Explore the virtual showroom and discover all our products and solutions in a whole range of categories including Cameras, Recording, Management, Video analysis and Video data transmission. With the Dallmeier PromoApp, you will always be up-to-date and have direct access to technical specifications and datasheets as well as specific links to instructions, white papers or updates. An entertaining special feature is dedicated to the patented Panomera® multifocal sensor technology, with many animation clips and demo sequences.

app.title: DBSeed
app.author: NextGen31
app.description: DBSeed is a data manager, highly customizable and user friendly. -specific data model for each Library (field types: text, image, calendar, checkbox, list, item link, autolink, url link, phone, mail ... more to come) -configurable list view, filter, search and sort. -CSV import/export (...smartphone/tablet, portrait/landscape, english/french)

app.title: Documobile - Electronic Parts Catalog Interface
app.author: Digabit, Inc.
app.description: Documobile allows users to view parts catalogs, technical documents, find technical information visually with our icon driven platform or search by keywords, descriptions, part numbers or other identifying information. With a few swipes of a finger, Documobile helps users quickly and easily access the exact document or part they want.

app.title: dotSlope
app.author: Nebulare
app.description: dotSlope is a professional-grade web/mobile software for civil, geotechnical and mining engineers developed to analyze slope stability problems through the limit equilibrium theory.

app.title: Recovery Act Dashboard
app.author: Anaara for American Department of Energy
app.description: As a solution for tracking billions of dollars over a diverse set of energy projects, the Department of Energy (DOE) decided to build the Recovery Dashboard. After demonstrating our expertise in the area, Anaara was asked to implement this RIA solution using Adobe Flex.

app.title: econoagro
app.author: eclipsastios.com
app.description: Manages applications for agricultural planning of livestock

app.title: ExhibitCore Viewer
app.author: RC Media Group, Inc.
app.description: Event planners, exhibitors, meeting planners or other event professionals can use this app to visualize any space. The app provides floor plan visualization solutions for trade shows, exhibits, expos, fairs, corporate events, booths, stands, corporate meetings, parties, weddings, homes, offices and much more.

app.title: FatFace
app.author: Genera Mobile
app.dev: iOS/Android: Flex 4.11.0 - AIR 4.0, BB10: Flex 4.6.0 - AIR 3.5
app.description: Tired of diets?! Get fat instantly with Fat Face app! What would you look like with a "few" extra pounds? A fun way to instantly stretch faces on your mobile phone. The application was made in pure AS3 & Flex, using Displacement Maps for the fat effect and Liquid Layout to cover all know devices. It's currently available for all BB10 devices (Z10, Z30 and Q5/Q10) and soon for iOS and Android devices, with very little effort thanks to the Flex relative layout tools.

app.title: FlexStore
app.author: Abilimbi
app.description:
'Abilimbi B2B E-commerce' is an eShopping platform for goods/services.
Functions include product browsing, filtering, sorting, discounting, price-Lists, currency, sales-tax, shopping-cart, customer registration, ordering, payment, delivery, shipping address-lists, reporting and administration etc.

app.title: The Glory of India
app.author: Kirit Tanna
app.description: History is not just a date, building and person - its a story. The Glory of India is an iOS + Android app which co-relates a lot of information to form a story around Indian history. Developed with Flex 4.6 and its mobile components, it delivers a consistent experience across devices. There's also a free lite version (limited) which is generated from the common code-base.

app.title: Goal Manager
app.author: GoalGames GmbH
app.description: GOAL 2014 - Football Manager is a free football management game for mobile phones and tablets, now available for iOS and Android. In this game a growing community of more than 3000 daily active managers from all over Europe face each other in a multi-level League system and a general Cup competition. To achieve victory, the managers have to decide tactics and formations, buy and sell players, plan individual trainings, study their opponents, build up a stadium and manage finances and sponsorships.

app.title: GRP Events
app.author: Omnience
app.description: GRP Events allows IBM customers and event administrators to view up-to-date information regarding any IBM event that is tracked by the IBM Global Registration Portal (GRP) system. This application allows users to view and register for upcoming IBM events, and, view event agenda's, post comments to social sites regarding these events via Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. GRP Events also allows users to add notes to specific events, in text or as voice notes. A full event calendar is also provided to view upcoming events, search for events that you are specifically interested in using location, brand, or virtual events. Administrators and IBM associates also have additional functionality that allows them to manage their events, track event specifics and view registration metrics.

app.title: HelpDiabetes 3
app.author: Experit SPRL
app.description: Carbohydrate counter for people with diabetes, with tracking logbook, insulin calculation, synchronize between different devices.

app.title: Inversis Banco
app.author: Cycle-IT
app.description: A powerful multi platform solution for investment banking.

app.title: iQ Agenda
app.author: WeLikeIt.Net
app.description:
Mobile app for syncing contacts, calendars, tasks and notes with SmarterTools brand email server SmarterMail. Features include:
  • Quick tab switching by swiping the tab icons or by swiping crosswise in any tab.
  • Quick "Agenda" view showing the next few days of tasks and events.
  • Contact details include a click to: "Call","SMS" and "Email" your contacts (supporting apps required).
  • Secure connection to SmarterMail servers having a secure certificate available.
  • Full offline use, allowing adding, editing and deleting of Contacts, Calendars, Tasks and Notes while offline.

app.title: KanbanCards - Visual Project Management
app.author: Tom Van den Eynde
app.description: KanbanCards is a real-time Kanban board service based on Apache Flex (4.11). Improve the efficiency of your teams (IT and non-IT) overnight. Next to Kanban cards, the solution also offers real-time messaging on account and board level. There's a free plan, so there's no reason for not giving it a try: www.kanbancards.com We're working on an iPad and Android version.

app.title: KOHLER® Generators - Generator Management System App
app.author: Kohler Co.
app.description: Enjoy peace of mind in the palm of your hands. Whether you’re at home, traveling or on the go, you’ll never have to worry about the power in your home or business.

app.title: LoadCargo.in
app.author: LoadCargo.in
app.description: LoadCargo.in is a sophisticated but also easy to use cargo loading optimization software, that helps to plan the way cargo is loaded into containers or trucks.

app.title: Managana
app.author: Lucas Santos Junqueira
app.description: Managana is a free (LGPL) cross-platform software for digital publication. It allows the creation and maintenance of communities that share interactive content on the web, tablets, smartphones and exhibits. It is presented as a multi-tool solution with a wysiwyg editor, a web/app player, an app wizard creation tool and a presentation software aimed at digital artists.

app.title: Marine Navigation
app.author: Marco Palaferri
app.description: Find your road on the sea! GPS chart plotter for your boat. An easy-to-use offline GPS tracker and route planner featuring worldwide offline maps. Wherever you are: sea, rivers or lakes it will help you find your way. Not only an app but an affordable tool for fishermen, sailors or just water sports passionates.

app.title: My Dojo for Dota 2
app.author: Jorge Yabra
app.description: My Dojo for Dota 2 is a mobile application that tracks personal statistics from the online video game Dota 2. It shows the results of matches in a easy to understand interface with extended information of each player.

app.title: myPartners
app.author: Web Site srl
app.description:
Engaging UX for documents and meetings sharing. myPartners is an Adobe AIR desktop/mobile application through which you can:
  • create your network of business partners, contacts and groups of contacts
  • give each partner a simple but powerful system for storing documents (from scanner and/or file system) into a common repository, possibly connected to "branded" Document Management Systems, such as Alfresco®
  • start tracking and control of shared documents between colleagues and partners
  • share deadlines and meetings in your calendar
  • reduce time for solving problems with an effective audio/video chat based on Flash Media Server

app.title: Next ERP
app.author: Juan Pablo de la Monja, Alvaro De la Peña, Alex De la Peña
app.description: It´s an ERP system made for retail companies, easy to use for all kind of users, it's used to collect data from business activity, product planning, inventory, shipping. Includes a complete Point of Sale for store and mobile.

app.title: New Digital Times
app.author: Andrey Kireev
app.description: NewDigitalTimes.com Builder allows creating Android and iOS apps with rich content and different interactions. You can use Web App or Air App to managed content.

app.title: Nodality
app.author: simon gladman
app.description:
Nodality is a new type of calculator: numbers and operators appear as nodes in a network interface and the relationships between them define your calculations.

For example, to add five and six, create two number nodes, one for five and one for six, create an operator node for the multiply operator, and finally define the two numbers as inputs to the operator. Although this sounds a little complicated for such a simple piece of arithmetic, Nodality allows you to edit the numbers, change the operator and expand the network to create complicated systems.

app.title: Piqxit
app.author: Andrea Benedetti
app.description: Piqxit is the easiest and most beautiful way to browse photos from Instagram, Flickr, 500px, Facebook, Pixabay and Dribbble. The intuitive interface is designed so that every possible pixel is used to display gorgeous retina sized photos on your device. Think of it as a mix between Flipboard, Feedly, Pixable and Pulse... but for photographs! You can scroll through photos by simply tilting your device back and forth with the exclusive auto-scroll feature. Be careful, it's very addictive! Infinitely scrolling lists that automatically load more images when you reach the bottom. No need to sign in or register, there's lots of beautiful content for you to browse right away. You can also sign in with Instagram or Facebook to see all your photos and your friends photos in a fast and simple way. Includes a powerful search engine: Enter a word and it will search Instagram tags, 500px photos, Flickr photos, tags and groups, and Pixabay photos. Bookmark and follow your favorite people to create your own personalized photo magazine. Save your favorite photos with a single click. Share with Facebook, Twitter or email. Designed for iOS7 and optimized for retina with beautiful, high-resolution images. More content coming soon: Tumblr, Twitter, Pinterest and Getty.

app.title: PillKit
app.author: Runware SAS
app.dev: AIR 18 / Flex 4.14.1 / Native extensions (for notifications and scan barcodes)
app.description: PillKit is an Android/iOS compatible application created by Runway SAS company to simplify your life in following your treatment. This is a digital pill box packed with innovative features such as scan bar codes, access to online instructions of use, reminders, synthesis of your treatments. This application is free. It allows you to be notified to the hours you have set and retrieve the daily list of medications you need to take during your day.

app.title: Plok - New Way to Store Information
app.author: Plok Team
app.description: Plok is a storage service to create and keep notes and all sorts of internet links including images and videos. It provides unlimited zooming environment, convenient data visualisation, and unique flexibility of data organization based on the advantages of your spatial memory. Notes can be organized into layers which can be shared between peers.

app.title: Pubanatomy - Integrated Exploration of Biomedical Literature and Data
app.author: Gary Yang
app.description:
Pubanatomy provide Medline and mouse atlas data exploration from a highly complex and intuitive web UI with blazing fast search/summary and stunning interactive 3D interfaces.

Implementation:

  • Web app is based on Apache Flex 4.11 with Away3D 4.1 ( no other framework ).
  • Search engine is based on Apache Solr 4.3, there are close to 23 million Medline citations are parsed and indexed incrementally with Java Spring Batch, Apache Lucene and JAXB2;
  • 3D models are generated by VTK, stored in MongoDB
  • Web server is based on Tomcat7, SpringMVC, SpringFlex and BlazeDS4
  • Built with Apache Maven 3.1, Flexmojos 6

app.title: ReDiLab: Node - Coupled Reaction Diffusion Systems with a Node Based User Interface
app.author: Simon Gladman
app.description: ReDiLab: Node is an Apache Flex application using Stage3D and AGAL that allows users to create multiple reaction diffusion nodes and couple them together using a node based user interface. The couplings acts as catalysts to the various parameters of the models and coupling can be recursive to simulate auto and mutual catalysts . End results can resemble phenomena including biological morphogenesis and fluid dynamics.

app.title: Scratch
app.author: MIT Media Lab
app.description: Scratch is a multimedia authoring tool that can be used by students, scholars, teachers, and parents for a range of educational and entertainment constructivist purposes from math and science projects, including simulations and visualizations of experiments, recording lectures with animated presentations, to social sciences animated stories, and interactive art and music. Simple games may be made with it, as well. Viewing the existing projects available on the Scratch website, or modifying and testing any modification without saving it requires no online registration.

app.title: SenseEarth.com
app.author: SenseEarth.com
app.description: http://www.SenseEarth.com is a browser based 3D map similar to Google Maps. Harnessing map data such as OpenStreetMaps, it visualizes your local buildings and points of interests. With the release of the Oculus Rift and other virtual reality goggles, we take a small step into The Matrix-like reality of immersion. As with any Beta software, please give us feedback @SenseEarth3D https://twitter.com/senseearth3d

app.title: SimpleDiagrams
app.author: McQuillen Interactive Pty. Ltd.
app.description: SimpleDiagrams is a Flex/AIR app for creating fast, clear sketches of problems, processes, workflows and ideas. The program is built with Adobe AIR, Flex 4.13 and uses the SWIZ library.

app.title: Social PM
app.author: esentri AG
app.description: Social PM (www.social-pm.com/en) is an online tool that helps you to stay on track and manage your tasks and projects. Features include Task Manager, Activity Stream, Document Management, Gantt Chart, Reports, Timesheets and a mobile App.

app.title: TEDxAthens 2016
app.author: SimpleApps
app.description: TEDxAthens 2016 is an event - agenda app for the upcoming TEDx Athens event. It provides information about the Program, Speakers and Venue. We also implemented Push notifications to be used for news and announcements during the event.

app.title: Todo Lists
app.author: REDCodeLabs
app.description: Simple, clean and fast To Do Lists. Easy to use and create: shopping lists, reminders, tasks for work or small projects. Just install and start using, no account or registration required. ~ All Free! ~. AppStore app coming soon.

app.title: Traffic LIVE
app.author: Deltek Inc. http://www.deltek.co.uk/
app.description: Traffic LIVE is a comprehensive creative business management system that provides visibility into resources, work and finances all in one place. Creative businesses all over the globe are using TrafficLIVE to improve efficiency and increase profit.

app.title: Train Lord
app.author: Jozef Chutka
app.description: Train Lord is a live massively multiplayer game (MMOG) using real world data and maps. The goal is simple. Become the richest lord in the world by buying rails, stations, trains, creating rail sets and dispatching trains.

app.title: VeraType
app.author: Judah Frangipane
app.description: VeraType converts images into text and text into images. It is also called ASCII Art but in this case you can write your own message and form into an image.

app.title: World Book Encyclopedia DVD Engine
app.author: Media Plus Jordan
app.description: Dynamic encyclopedia DVD engine for creating custom encyclopedia. it contains an admin side for data entry and look and feel customization, and a user side for navigation through articles.
